Package org.sbml.jsbml.ext.arrays.validator.constraints

Class ArraysConstraint

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sbml.jsbml.ext.arrays.validator.constraints.ArraysConstraint
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArraysMathCheck, DimensionArrayDimCheck, DimensionIDCheck, DimensionSizeCheck, IndexArrayDimCheck, IndexAttributesCheck, SBaseWithDimensionCheck

    public abstract class ArraysConstraint
extends java.lang.Object
    An ArraysConstraint object ensures that a given Model doesn't violate a certain validation rule defined in the arrays specification.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Leandro Watanabe
